metadata.title: CVE-2024-38590 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Modify the print level of CQE errorToo much print may lead to a panic in kernel. Change ibdev_err() toibdev_err_ratelimited(), and change the printing level of cqe dumpto debug level.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
